title: Watchdog Faults DEA Response to Opioid Deaths
text:
The U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration was slow to respond to the nation’s opioid crisis, the Justice Department’s watchdog said in a report that criticized the agency for allowing drug manufacturers to significantly increase the production of powerful painkillers as overdose-death rates soared.
